Package gameplay

Class MainLoop

java.lang.Object
gameplay.MainLoop
public class MainLoop
extends java.lang.Object
The Main game loop program to execute ecah of the game phase.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    GameData d_GameData
    get Game data as an object, used to be the input parameter for GameEngine class
    GameEngine d_GameEngine
    get game engine as an object that used to call the function from GameEngine class
    java.io.File d_MapFile
    map file that use to load represent game map.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    main method， Show each game phase from GameEngine, and run the game according to the game rules

    call function from GameEngine class, and according to the game rule to execute the game.
    void MainLogic()
    According to user input to check in which model that user are going to get in.
